_header: My life I end in sorrow and woe
Note: In sermon, ‘Dominica in passione vel in die parasceue’.
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, sufferings of
_description: Christ’s sufferings to save mankind, in a Latin prose homily, ‘Amore langueo — one couplet

OxfBal149.Transcription: My lyue y hynde in sorwe and woMan to hyme from ys fo
OxfBal149.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 131.

OxfMagd93.Transcription: And yn my lyf y had snowe and woman to lye fro his fro

CULKk424.Transcription:
My lyfe ys bownde in sorwe & woMan to brynghe from hys
                    foo

TCD277.Transcription: My lyf I end in soro & woman to bye fro hys foo
